name: Silcarb Recrystallized
description: Silicon Carbide Heating Elements are des
overview:
Silcarb has been in the field of Manufacturing Silicon Carbide Heating Elements for the past three decades, with its plant located at BANGALORE, South India.

Facilities: Located in the suburbs of Bangalore, the plant spreads over 7 acres plot with highly skilled and trained workers, quality inspection of all incoming materials and a regular test lab for quality tests at each stage of manufacture. The plant also has its own R&D division.

Heating Elements: Three Piece Straight Alpha SIC Rods Reaction Bonded Single Spiraled Heating Elements Reaction Bonded Double Spiraled Heating Elements U-Shaped Alpha SIC Rods Dumbell Shaped Silicon Carbide Heating Elements

Furnaces:

Tower Melting Furnaces Tower Melting Cum Holding Furnaces Crucible Type Electric Melting And Holding Furnaces Crucible Type Tilting Furnaces For Copper, Aluminium, Zinc Holding Furnace using Ceramic Boards Reverberatory Furnaces Heat Treatment Furnaces High Temperature Furnaces Electric Forging Furnaces
